name: Death Mask (itch)
description:
- Death Mask -

Goal: Kill the Conjurer.  He possesses the powerful Death Mask which he uses to summon the dead.  Collect all of the creatures to create your own masks to empower your fight against him.

Lose Conditions:  If the gate to your left is destroyed or if you lose your life.

Good Luck!

- Instructions -
Move: W A S D
Jump: Space
Sword Attack: Left Mouse / Enter
Ranged Attack (when enabled): Right Mouse / R Shift
Wall Jumping (when enabled): Space when sliding on wall
Put on Mask (when possessed): 1,2,3,4, or 5
